website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, classic method to improve swing speed and coordination.
pros: The streamlined and minimalist donut design has been a go-to for years to increase batting speed
Available in 16- and 28-ounce versions for different experience levels, and works well with both baseball and softball bats
cons: Rubberized outer coating may develop cracks after prolonged use

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Kids Baseball Team
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little weight. We use it on my kids baseball team (6-8 year olds). They like to put it on the bat and use in the on deck circle. We liked it so much I bought a second one after the first one was left behind at the fields. It is small 3-4" around and probably about 3/4" thick. It easily fits on all the kids bats from 26" to 30" bats, big barrel or regular barrel.
customer_reviews.author: Shaws

customer_reviews.title: They are solid and I love that Easton still makes them in a 28 ounce ...
customer_reviews.text: I remember using these as a kid so when I started playing adult softball again I wanted to buy one. They are solid and I love that Easton still makes them in a 28 ounce and not just a 16 ounce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am using them as water weights.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how well they work as bat weights, as I use them to weigh down items in the pool so they don't float. There is a small hole in the side that I filled up with a little silicone and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Mcins

customer_reviews.title: Great for youth.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. I am a coach for 7-8 year old baseball team. The weight of this is very helpful to these kids to increase bat speed. The kids notice a difference when they step up to bat too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good donut
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy until your kid gets an on deck circle. I bought this a season too soon during rookie ball. My son does say it helps him swing harder. I agree.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTarget

customer_reviews.title: A throw back for all dads
customer_reviews.text: It works. Just like it did when all of us were in little league. Just be careful to check the size of your bat to make sure it fits.
customer_reviews.author: cdk

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need.
customer_reviews.text: It's a donut....what else do you need. 10 year use it to stretch out and rake a few swing before he get up the plate for another hit in the tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: Wannabedyi

customer_reviews.title: Bat
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product because of the simple fact that it helped my son with his batting. It was able to get the bat off his shoulder because it made the bat lighter
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Used or returned
customer_reviews.text: I could have given 5 stars, if the item would have been new... I understand that a "returned item" is basically new, but when the package is already teared, it shouldn't be sold as "new". And I paid for a new one. Apart from that, the item is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved it, so far it does exactly what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: James Finn

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable bat weight
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Nice donut. Maybe a little too heavy for my 9 year old. But that’s not Easton’s fault.
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it needed to do. Every member of the team was using it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses for softball. Now whole team uses it on deck.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: One of them loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: All the kids on the team used this one. One of them loved it so much, he took it. So ill be buying another one soon. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Maksimik

customer_reviews.title: As described, very fast delivery, my son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bat! We just recently received this bat, but so far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Chase

customer_reviews.title: Good for the kids to build strenght and for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: Must have for any baseball player. Use it to build strength. It fits nicely on all Bats I use included my kids T-ball bats
customer_reviews.author: Swodogg

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: This weight works perfectly. When I ordered it I wasn't sure the bat would weigh more but once I put this bat weight on, sure enough, the bat did indeed weigh more. Mind blown! If ever I need another bat to be heavier than it is I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mdog

customer_reviews.title: Used for only half a softball season and the rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for only half a softball season and the rubber is already falling apart. Poorly made. This is not meant for softball bats. Now the donut is flying off the bat when taking a swing. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: BLISS117

customer_reviews.title: Bat Weight
customer_reviews.text: It's blue, round and weighted. That's all you can ask for. Arrived on time in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty heavy and good fit for little league baseball bat
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty heavy and good fit for little league baseball bat. I though two comes, but had only one.
customer_reviews.author: Eri

customer_reviews.title: Fit all our bats
customer_reviews.text: Product fit both my son's tee ball bat and daughter's softball bat. It's a little more than I'd like to pay for something like that, but it's hard to find one too much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Perfect for my 10 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Wish there were other weight denominations and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Coates

customer_reviews.title: Item is exactly what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: Great weights perfect for my 13 and 14 Year old!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Forrest

customer_reviews.title: It’s an okay product
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay product. It’s to heavy for my baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Nice batting aid
customer_reviews.text: Nice batting aid. Just wished the inner diameter was a little bigger. Will not go on bat if you are using the Easton Power Pad. ☹☹
customer_reviews.author: keva

customer_reviews.title: Ideal bat weight
customer_reviews.text: Ideal batting weight! Super fast shipping and great quality weights. Durable!
customer_reviews.author: Retro Clemson

customer_reviews.title: Great Batting Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Good batting trainer. Builds a kids muscles and allows for better control of the bat during actual swings at balls. Fits well and is secure
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Joe Wynman

customer_reviews.title: Low calorie Donut
customer_reviews.text: It's round and fits over a bat! Weighs 16 oz. Pretty much what you see is what you get. Don't be fooled by people calling these a "donut". Mine tasted like rubber and there was no jelly, or creme filling inside at all. Possibly sprinkles or a light glaze would have made it better, but over all I prefer a cherry cake style. If being purchased for breakfast, save your money and go to Tim Hortons or Dunkin Donuts. If you're buying it to help with bat speed and warming up in the on deck circle, you've made a wise choice!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B. single father and family shopper

customer_reviews.title: It's a bat weight
customer_reviews.text: It does the job in warming up a batter's arms. Its nicely coated. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Batter Up!
customer_reviews.text: Comments: Item was as described, arrived fast, and packaging looked great, Authentic. Used for my 11 yr old daughters softball bat. Pro's: great price point, light weight, fits well on any bat, clean/great look Con's: none right now
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Fits!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old son's weight fit his bat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Puskas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: 28 oz version is heavier than I would have preferred....oh well. It does what its supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Barr

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a doughnut. helped my sons bat speed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony O.

customer_reviews.title: For my 8u baseball player
customer_reviews.text: My son uses the Easton bat weight during batting practice. It helps him with his swinging. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 16 oz perfect for the little league age players. Good quality for cost.
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and definitely helps build strength and bat speed!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha R.

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool
customer_reviews.text: Good weight for practice swings. Stays securely in place on the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Good and simple
customer_reviews.text: Just a simple bat weight, but it does its job. Slips a bit on some bats.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does what's supposed to do. Not much else to say
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using it regularly and works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son liked this weight a lot. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer from CT

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 11 year old son.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son 2 5/8 inch barrel. Definitely can feel the weight on the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne's World

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I need this this for my baseball team. 15 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Felix A

customer_reviews.title: Fits youth and adult bats
customer_reviews.text: Fits my son's youth bat with no issues.Not allowed to be used to warm up during a game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: helps my son in LL with both bat speed and power
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Product was delivered as listed for a good price. Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered as listed for a good price. Very satisfied with this purchase. I would not hesitate to purchase other items in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JL Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: As others have commented item is used with 2 holes in outer shell. Money refunded
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Pillar

customer_reviews.title: Just like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old takes it to his games. Everybody uses it. Popular item. Holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: kegerino

customer_reviews.title: Item is fine but it's used
customer_reviews.text: Item is fine but the product was opened and appears to be used (has dirt on the Back..:maybe a return?) I would appreciated if I'm paying full price that the item is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Duhaime

customer_reviews.title: It's a bat donut.
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Fits well on my son's 2 1/4" little league bat. Seems to be well made. Only nock is that the shipping seemed to be a little slow.
customer_reviews.author: l.k.

customer_reviews.title: Got double charged
customer_reviews.text: First payment went through, week later I got charged again.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: As You'd Expect
customer_reviews.text: It's a batting donut! What more can you say. It's what you'd expect and decent quality. I'm hitting .917 in slow pitch softball right now and I owe it all to this bat weight! :)
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for warming up before at-bats
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a smidge heavy for my 5 year old to warm up with but my 7 year old uses it fine. They both play machine pitch and this helps get their bat speed up just a little bit before they go up to bat.
customer_reviews.author: Online connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Softball Training
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's softball practice. Work well for warm up and to get the feel of extending your arms through the hitting area. Rubber coating is easy on the bat, and provides just enough holding power to stay put. Worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for young batters.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old son to warm up before batting. Works exactly like it should. After a few months, his bat speed has increased considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Warrior

customer_reviews.title: This is good for players with bats up to 12-14yrs old
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old son really likes this. This is good for players with bats up to 12-14yrs old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a present for Christmas and the packaging it came in is embarrassing. Held together with tape
customer_reviews.author: ALFREDO FUENTES

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than anticipated for my daughter but that's on me for not doing more research. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: lambertlunatic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great for my little league team. Keep it in the on deck circle
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: It'll be easily identifiable in the batters box
customer_reviews.text: Our team colors are Royal. It's a solid bat weight. It'll be easily identifiable in the batters box, as every team has a black batting weight. I like the sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: B1neary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys love them. Great for helping the players increase bat speed at the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for it
customer_reviews.text: Basically, my son just uses it for when he does his 100 swings a day as a training tool. Perfect for it. Have had Eastons forever and they never really disappoint, but it's not like they're overly complicated devices.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Vendor
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped to me was not as depicted in color nor in shape. I hate receiving a product other than depicted. Impossible to return without spending your time obtaining RMA number, repackaging and addressing, using your gas to go to post office and waiting in long line and paying shipping to return. Don't buy from this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Credeur

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture featured TWO, so it was very deceiving! We only got one! VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gram

customer_reviews.title: Good bat weight
customer_reviews.text: Good bat weight, bought it about 2 months ago and haven't used it yet. But when I do, I'm sure it'll be the best. Kinda hard to screw up a cast iron ring, covered in rubberized plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Adair

customer_reviews.title: Bat weight
customer_reviews.text: Yes worked great , good feel the difference after using practice swimgs
customer_reviews.author: Dan Talboy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful seller with great products. Their On time, product was Packaged well, came in its original factory sealed case and was authentic! not a " bootleg/fake" and definitely was never used! I and my daughter were the first to open and to use it and we're very pleased by it. Item is Correct weight and color that we picked. This Easton "Bat donut" is a good product of a great price that arrived the next day on time.☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: D money

product_meta.title: EASTON Baseball Bat Weight, 16oz Weight, Royal, On Deck Donut Bat Wait To Warm-Up For Confident Plate Appearances, Slides On And Off Any Baseball Bat
product_meta.description: Available in 16 oz. youth size and 28 oz. adult size, durable vinyl-covered cast iron, fits securely on bat barrel.
